contents.text: Welcome to Plate Havoc | Roguelike Test! This is here to explain the basics of the game
Plate Havoc is a roguelike random-events game, with some modes that differ from the typical rogue experience.
Survive random events. The bossbar up top displays when events happen. Intensity will rise upon an event, controlling the severity of the events.
Dying is to be expected. Trial and error are key to success.
Skipping this is not reccomended for first time players.
If you want to leave in this state. Press the warning symbol at the top of the screen and [Disconnect] / [Save and Quit to Title]
